(Original) We went here on a Sunday and luckily it was quiet which meant we didn't need a booking, however booking in advance is recommended. The team were friendly and helpful. The whole set up was organised and it felt very safe. Turn up and drive was ¬£20 for 20 laps and then you purchase gloves and a balaclava for ¬£2 each, so ¬£24 all in. Good value and you can use the gloves and balaclava if you go again. Light refreshments are available, plenty of parking and toilets are close by. Great track and state of the art kit, highly recommended.

topComments.author: Anthony Antoniou
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Absolutamente brilhante!  Imprescind√≠vel para qualquer pessoa em Tenby que gosta de emo√ß√£o  O percurso era de um tamanho razo√°vel, os carros eram √≥timos - tive que usar os carrinhos juniores porque minha filha tinha menos de 16 anos e eu esperava o pior, mas esses foram muito r√°pidos  Os funcion√°rios foram muito simp√°ticos, prestativos e muito bem organizados. Ficou claro que eles levam seu H&S muito a s√©rio e os procedimentos de carga e descarga de carros eram eficientes, organizados e muito seguros  Minha filha nunca tinha andado de kart antes e ao final da primeira sess√£o voc√™ n√£o saberia porque apesar do percurso ser interessante, com v√°rias curvas e chicanas ainda era seguro o suficiente para que ela pudesse se empurrar, sabendo se ela tivesse alguma dificuldade , ela seria ajudada imediatamente e com efici√™ncia  Divertimo-nos tanto que voltamos para uma segunda visita quando nosso filho de 25 anos apareceu e achou √≥timo tamb√©m, mesmo nos carros juniores, o que era bom saber, considerando que ele j√° andou carregando muitas vezes  Reserve um tempo para visitar, voc√™ realmente vai gostar  (Original) Absolutely brilliant!  A must for anyone in Tenby who fancies some excitement  The course was a fair size, the cars were great - I had to use the junior carts as my daughter was under 16 and I was expecting the worst but these were very quick  The staff were really nice, really helpful and very well organised. It was clear they take their H&S very seriously and the procedures for loading and unloading of cars was efficient, organised and very safe indeed  My daughter had never been carting before and by the end of the first session you wouldn't have known because despite the course being interesting, with several turns and chicanes it was still safe enough that she could push herself, knowing if she got into difficulty, she would be helped out immediately and efficiently  We had so  much fun that we returned for a second visit when our 25 year old son turned up and he thought it was great too, even in the junior cars, which was good to know considering he has been carting many times  DO take the time to visit, you will really enjoy it

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Muito divertido. Bem executado, apesar do pequeno tamanho do local. A √∫nica desvantagem √© que os karts pareciam muito r√°pidos para a pista. Al√©m disso, as luvas fornecidas n√£o eram de qualidade boa o suficiente. Saiu com uma pequena bolha em uma m√£o e uma que teve a parte superior arrancada no meio da sess√£o, na outra. Embora tudo em uma boa divers√£o e definitivamente voltaria novamente. Talvez traga minhas pr√≥prias luvas da pr√≥xima vez.  (Original) Great fun. Well run despite the small size of the venue. Only drawback was the karts felt too fast for the track. Hitting some of the bumps in the track at those speeds caused me on 2 occasions to have to let go of the wheel to avoid hurting myself and also felt myself come out of my seat. Alongside that the gloves provided were not good enough quality. Left with a small blister on one hand and one that had the top ripped off mid-session on the other. All in good fun though and definitely would go again. Maybe bring my own gloves though next time.
